27#include <sys/cdefs.h>
28__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: radeon_uvd_v3_1.c,v 1.1 2018/08/27 14:38:20 riastradh Exp $");
29
30#include <drm/drmP.h>
31#include "radeon.h"
32#include "radeon_asic.h"
33#include "nid.h"
34
35/**
36 * uvd_v3_1_semaphore_emit - emit semaphore command
37 *
38 * @rdev: radeon_device pointer
39 * @ring: radeon_ring pointer
40 * @semaphore: semaphore to emit commands for
41 * @emit_wait: true if we should emit a wait command
42 *
43 * Emit a semaphore command (either wait or signal) to the UVD ring.
44 */
45bool uvd_v3_1_semaphore_emit(struct radeon_device *rdev,
46 struct radeon_ring *ring,
47 struct radeon_semaphore *semaphore,
48 bool emit_wait)
49{
50 uint64_t addr = semaphore->gpu_addr;
51
52 radeon_ring_write(ring, PACKET0(UVD_SEMA_ADDR_LOW, 0));
53 radeon_ring_write(ring, (addr >> 3) & 0x000FFFFF);
54
55 radeon_ring_write(ring, PACKET0(UVD_SEMA_ADDR_HIGH, 0));
56 radeon_ring_write(ring, (addr >> 23) & 0x000FFFFF);
57
58 radeon_ring_write(ring, PACKET0(UVD_SEMA_CMD, 0));
59 radeon_ring_write(ring, 0x80 | (emit_wait ? 1 : 0));
60
61 return true;
62}
63
